name: Hyper Soccer
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 31 in 72 hours. Web-Version (supposedly) doesn't support Gamepads, so download the Desktop-Version below, if you want to play with a gamepad.

Web-Version is original LD 31 version. Downloadable Desktop-Version (v1.1) has an important bugfix regarding gamepad input and some minor bugfixes/changes regarding gameplay.

If the Web-Version doesn't work:

  • Check if your Browser/Computer supports WebGL. And try to enable it when disabled.
  • Use Chrome. (It might work in other browsers, but Chrome usually gets the best performance.)
  • Download the Desktop-Version below instead.

See the entry page and final rating on ludumdare.com
